Database¶

class archABM.database.Database[source]¶

In-memory database of the simulation components

It registers: Options, AerosolModel, Actions, Event list, Place list, Person list, simulation run ID.

options: None¶
model: None¶
actions: None¶
events: list¶
places: list¶
people: list¶
run: int¶
next() → None[source]¶

Increments one unit the simulation run ID
